abstract: The British banking giant is making progress in shrinking its consumer loan portfolio in the United States, which has been a drag on its earnings.
snippet: The British banking giant is making progress in shrinking its consumer loan portfolio in the United States, which has been a drag on its earnings.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – The British bank HSBC made some progress on Tuesday in shrinking its consumer loan portfolio in the United States, which has been a drag on its earnings.

headline.main: HSBC Sells U.S. Loan Portfolio for $3.2 Billion
